price: Nokorε sε, Menomee wͻ wo so kͻpem Atemmuda “.
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
